mdRecord.dcterms:title: Turry, Hermann (?) to Henry Faulds; 04 of 09
mdRecord.dcterms:description: 3. Doepner/Faulds--LettersItems 41-117--Scrapbook 2Turry, Hermann (?) to Henry Faulds regarding the enclosed article. In German (previously cataloged DF 641). Enclosed: "International Public Safety", Official Journal of the International Criminal Police Commission, no. 13, July 15, 1925.; 9 pages; DF 870
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Crime prevention
